minepick-platformer.title: Minepick Platformer
minepick-platformer.description: Test for a platformer where you can lodge a minepike into walls. Left/Right to move, X to jump, Z to swing.

8-legs-to-love.title: 8 Legs to Love
8-legs-to-love.description: Spin a web, eat bugs, earn points, and have fun!

snowboarding.title: Snowboarding
snowboarding.description: Downhill snowboarding simulation. Left/Right to turn, Z to jump.

wave-function-collapse.title: Wave Function Collapse
wave-function-collapse.description: My implementation of the Wave Function Collapse algorithm.

racquet-panic.title: Racquet Panic
racquet-panic.description: Breakout but with a tennis player. Left/Right to move, Z to forehand, Up + Z to spike, Down + Z to lob.

smash-game.title: Smash Game
smash-game.description: The beginnings of a Smash-like fighting game. Arrow keys to move, Space to jump, Shift to dash, Z to attack.

3d-blocks.title: 3D Blocks
3d-blocks.description: Just me messing around with WebGL. Mouse to control camera, WASD to move, Space to ascend, Ctrl to descend, Shift to speed up.

grapple-game.title: Grapple Game
grapple-game.description: Debug playground for a platformer featuring a grappling hook. WASD to move, Space to jump, Click and hold to grapple, Shift to pull grapple.

processing-sketchbook.title: Processing sketchbook
processing-sketchbook.description: Some doodles to get acquainted with Processing.

breakout-ball.title: Breakout Ball
breakout-ball.description: Testing frame-by-frame hitboxes to see how that would feel. Left/Right to move, Z to swing.

paradox-anomaly.title: Paradox: Anomaly
paradox-anomaly.description: A puzzle game involving time travel. Arrow keys to move, Z to interact, X to travel 5 seconds into the past.

boss-rush.title: Boss rush game
boss-rush.description: A platformer intended to be a sequence of boss fights. Only one was fully programmed (with another, a fire queen, in development).

spider-game.title: Spider game
spider-game.description: A simple spider web simulation. WASD to move, Shift to start and release a new strand.

minisnake.title: minisnake
minisnake.description: An exercise in code golf. The goal was to implement a minimalist version of Snake in the fewest characters possible. The version above is 623 characters minified.

zombie-aflockalypse.title: Zombie Aflockalypse
zombie-aflockalypse.description: A flocking simulation. The zombies (green dots) are programmed to seek out humans (blue dots) while the humans are programmed to stick together and avoid zombies.

hex-world.title: Hex World
hex-world.description: A little hex world with customizable terrain.

nebulaic.title: Nebulaic
nebulaic.description: A Flash game built around gravity. The red particles follow your mouse, try to turn all the particles red!

physics-engine.title: Physics Engine
physics-engine.description: The beginnings of my first ever physics engine.

efflorescence.title: Efflorescence
efflorescence.description: An extremely esoteric math game. Click the stems of fruits to make them fall to the ground.

mindsweeper.title: Mindsweeper
mindsweeper.description: An experimental take on Minesweeper for Play With Your Mind.

virtual-pet.title: Virtual Pet
virtual-pet.description: Animation test for a virtual pet game.
